content.html: Drop your blog URL in the replies and reshare. I’ll subscribe to your feed. You can subscribe to everyone here too, using any number of services: @feedly, @newsblur, and many more. It’s so much better than newsletters - and nobody can stop you from reading or writing.
content.value:
Drop your blog URL in the replies and reshare.

I’ll subscribe to your feed. You can subscribe to everyone here too, using any number of services: @feedly, @newsblur, and many more. It’s so much better than newsletters - and nobody can stop you from reading or writing.
